CustomField.description: This setting enables you to restrict the overall width of the survey responder interface when viewed on a respondent's desktop device. It's important to be aware that this setting does not affect the survey responder interface when accessed on a mobile device.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Adjust the width of the survey responder interface to suit your preferences on desktop devices. This setting allows you to specify the width as a percentage relative to the screen area, ensuring optimal presentation.
CustomField.label: Desktop Survey Interface Width (%)
